name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Chronicles - DLC 3
summary: This DLC includes a new Scenario, Character, Subquests, and Building Types content. Players can campaign through the Additional Scenario: Martial Arts Tournament, where they can liven up the party with the Additional Character, Milim. The game also features Additional Subquests, such as Valentines Day, Blumund Cooking Contest, Prepackaged Curry, and Beer. Additionally, players can sharpen Tempest with the inclusion of new Additional Building Types, including an Edgy Liquor Store, Edgy Tool Shop, Baron Goblin, Edgy Apartment Complex, and Edgy Armory.
